<div>  
  <h3> Basic R Commands </h3>
  <table>
    <tr>
      <th>R Symbol</th>
      <th>Operation</th>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>+</td>
      <td>Addition</td>
    </tr>
     <tr>
      <td>-</td>
      <td>Subtraction</td>
    </tr>
     <tr>
      <td>*</td>
      <td>Multiplication</td>
    </tr>
     <tr>
      <td>/</td>
      <td>Division</td>
    </tr>
     <tr>
      <td>^ OR **</td>
      <td>Exponentiation</td>
    </tr>
  </table>
  <ul>
    <li>
      These can be used together in parentheses () to determine the order of operations (PEMDAS)
    </li>
  </ul>
  <table>
    <tr>
      <th>R Symbol</th>
      <th>Description</th>
      <th>Math Symbol</th>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>sqrt(x)</td>
      <td>Square Root</td>
      <td>&radic;	x</td>
    </tr>
     <tr>
      <td>exp(x)</td>
      <td>e raised to the x power</td>
      <td>e^x</td>
    </tr>
     <tr>
      <td>log(x)</td>
      <td>Natural Log</td>
      <td>ln(x)</td>
  </table>
  
  <table>
    <tr>
      <th>R Symbol</th>
      <th>Description</th>
      <th>Example</th>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>#</td>
      <td>Comment (doesn't run this part in code chunk)</td>
      <td>#comment</td>
    </tr>
     <tr>
      <td><-</td>
      <td>Assignment (provides a variable with a value)</td>
      <td>x <- 5</td>
    </tr>
  </table>
